data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
In the minute 45, Angus MacDonald is booked for the away team.
Michael Smith is on a sub for George Hirst for Rotherham.
In the minute 65, Aitor Karanka (Birmingham) is making a first substitution, with Jon Toral replacing Scott Hogan.
Paul Warne is making the team's second substitution at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium with Kieran Sadlier replacing Mikel Miller.
Ivan Sunjic (Birmingham) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 78, Gary Gardner is replacing Ivan Sunjic for Birmingham at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium.
Rotherham have been awarded a penalty in Birmingham...
Kieran Sadlier smashes in a penalty at St Andrew's Trillion Trophy Stadium. The score is now 0-1.
Birmingham have been awarded a penalty...
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Jeremie Bela equalizes with a well-taken penalty.
